gestures.name: LEFT_JAB
gestures.description: Left arm extends forward as a jab

gestures.name: RIGHT_JAB
gestures.description: Right arm extends forward as a jab

gestures.name: LEAN_UP
gestures.description: Both hands raised near ears, elbows bent (high guard/lean up)
criteria: Wrists close to head (X distance < 0.13 of normalized image width)
Elbows at or above shoulder height

gestures.name: LEAN_DOWN
gestures.description: Both hands dropped down, arms relaxed or straight (lean down)
criteria: Both wrists below respective hips (+0.02 margin)
Both elbows below respective shoulders (+0.02 margin)
Arms can be straight or slightly bent (angle > 140°)
